title: Busou Shoujo Machiavellianism: Doki! "Goken-darake" no Ian Ryokou
original_name: 武装少女マキャヴェリズム ドキッ！「五剣だらけ」の慰安旅行
ending_song: "DECIDE" by Tenga Goken [Rin Onigawara (Yuuki Takada), Mary Kikakujou (Sayaka Kitahara), Satori Tamada (Nozomi Nishida), Warabi Hanasaka (Rina Hidaka), Tsukuyo Inaba (Natsumi Hioka)]
sinopse: Original 13th episode bundled with the limited edition 7th volume of the Busou Shoujo Machiavellianism manga.
